 2009-12092009-07-30,  INDUSTRY,  ,  , 
ActCompanies' Creditors Arrangement Act
SubjectCompaniesâ€™ Creditors Arrangement Regulations
PrecisCOMPANIES' CREDITORS ARRANGEMENT REGULATIONS to provide certainty and clarity for stakeholders with respect to recent amendments to insolvency legislation by adding definitions and standardizing information to be provided under the Bankruptcy and Insolvency Act. They also streamline the administrative burden particularly for trustees in bankruptcy. The regulations also support the new mandate of the Superintendent of Bankruptcy regarding the record keeping involved with the filing for bankruptcy.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2009-0219 Publication Date: 2009-08-19
